writeHashes

public void writeHashes(java.util.Collection<TweetHash> hash)
Write a collection of TweetHash to the output stream. For each TweetHash, the method writeHash(TweetHash) is called.

Parameters:

writeTweets

public void writeTweets(java.util.Collection<Tweet> tweets)
Write a collection of Tweet to the output stream. For each Tweet, the method writeTweet(Tweet) is called.

Parameters:
tweets -

readCommand

public byte readCommand()
Read a single byte from the input stream and return it.

Returns:

readConfigurationOrHash

public TweetHash readConfigurationOrHash()
After reading the CMD_CONF or the CMD_HASH, this method can be called to read the remote configuration or the TweetHash (respectively).

Note that the remote configuration is returned in a TweetHash container.

Returns:

readTweet

public Tweet readTweet()
After reading the CMD_TWEET, this method can be called to read a tweet

Returns:
